title: ProjectSNT and Friends
html_content:
ProjectSNT and Friends is an expansion pack of Chris's custom TSSSF cards, consisting of cards that involve ProjectSNT and her redesigns.

Cards

Card Name Type Icon Effect Description Date published
A Chat Between SNT and Chris Chan Goal Checkmark Win this Goal when: SNT and Chris Chan, with the Sonichu keyword, are shipped together on the shipping grid. In C-197, I had a fateful encounter where I was sent to thwart another Eggman scheme, but I eneded up meeting the one-and-only SNT. She and I enjoyed a pleasant conversation. I even pointed out her inhabitual attraction when it went off: I was immune to it. Also, she was still grasping the concept of communicating with Courtney, being an OC of hers, and so forth. I offered my insight and thoughts. She felt better. And then we took down Eggman. -Chris Chan Sonichu. 12 December 2019[1]
Angelica Roseolga Pony Female, Wing, Hourglass Blessed Flight Scouting (Search): You may search the Ship or Pony discard pile for 1 card of your choice and put it into your hand. If it's still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Angelica and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Angelica is a Paladin, since she is highly religious in beliefs and habits with lots of light and life power, and that she was raised by nuns. In CS-89, her wings are not attached, but appear by way of electric waves. She can still fly, and wields a battle axe blessed by Lethander. 9 July 2022
Bubbles Roseblu Pony Female, Unicorn Horn, Hourglass Counting Seashells (Swap): You may swap 2 Pony cards on the shipping grid. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Bubbles and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Bubbles is a Druid, as her specialty in Water Magic is beyond excellence. 10 July 2022
Chris Chan Sonicleric Pony Female, Alicorn Cleric Healing (Search): You may search the Ship of Pony discard pile for 1 card of your choice and put it into your hand. It its still in your hand at the end of your turn, discard it. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Chris Chan and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Chris Chan, of CS-89, is a Cleric, since she was still in destiny to be promoted to become a CPU, and that she had her own deity-level abilities, magic and powers. She tends to meditate a lot and helps her party with as much healing as possible, while also shining deity-level light power to overpower the dungeon bosses. 13 December 2019[2]
CS-89 Rosey Pony Female, Horseshoe, Hourglass Bolt Mallet Smash! (Replace): While this card is in your hand, your may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Rosey and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Rosey is a Fighter, because she has great physical strength and can adapt to most of any weaponry created from her natural electricity and lightning, and she is skilled in many a physical combat. 10 July 2022
CS-89 Sonichu Pony Male, Horseshoe, Hourglass Thunderbolt (New Goal): You may discard 1 active Goal and draw 1 new Goal to replace it. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Sonichu and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Sonichu is a Ranger, because he uses nature to his advantage, as well as his natural mach speed. He can be impulsive, but he is moreover with reasoning and shared wisdoms from a Wizard. 10 July 2022
Hatching A Child Ship Heart N/A In a polygamous relationship, Fantasia Sonichu and Megara Rosechu take their relationship a step further with a natural child for their family, Magi-Chan Sonichu was the donor. 13 July 2022
Magi-Chan Sonola Pony Male, Wing with Unicorn Horn, Hourglass Dimensional Reading (Special): You may make all other Pony cards shipped with this card ⌛, if you do, this card is not ⌛, this lasts until the end of the turn, This power cannot be copied. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Magi-Chan and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Magi-Chan is a Wizard, for, amongst the obvious reasons, he has taken many a careful and tudious practice and study into his psychic and magic-type of powers and techniques, specializing in conjuring. 11 July 2022
Punchy Sonilibre Pony Male, Horseshoe, Hourglass T.K.O.!!! (Replace): While this card is in your hand, you may discard a Pony card from the grid and play this card in its place. This power cannot be copied. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Punchy and everyone else functions in a Dungeons and Dragons style of classes and quests. Punchy is a Monk, because he has trained to control his strength, anger, and fatigue impulses. His knuckles are the toughest and must durable, he is still able to dig and break rocks. 11 July 2022
SNT Sonichu Pony Female, Wing with Unicorn Horn Zapping Special (Special): While this card is in your hand, you may discard a Pony card with the Villain keyword from the grid and play this card in its place. And then you may discard another Villain from the grid. This power cannot be copied. Where Eggman failed with SNT, he tried it again with Sonichu and Rosechu DNA. He also tried adding a pre-programmed mind-control chip into her brain, but it failed when an EMP from a nearby cybertronian permanently disabled the device and freeing her. 11 July 2022
Wild Sonirisu Pony Male, Earth Pony Archery Play (Special): When you play this card onto the grid, you may discard a Pony card, other than this one, from the shipping grid. From Cwcville in Dimension CS-89, Wild and everyone else functions in a Dungeons & Dragons style of classes and quests. Wild is a Ranger since his specialty is climbing, long-range offenses, and his very well-educated stealth and ninja skills. 13 December 2019[3]
